message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, it's valued at $15000 by us. We're offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $14000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to potentially working with you!
